Day1 at the Singapore office - It's incredibly refreshing to experience the same energizing atmosphere and vibe in a new location. 

Delivering with customer‚Ä¶
data.text:
Embracing change is the key to success in today's turbulent times. SaaS Accelerate 2024 by AWS Startups Malaysia is your gateway to unlocking the full potential of the SaaS model. Through personalized sessions and expert guidance, you'll learn how to navigate the challenges and seize the opportunities of SaaS transformation at this in-person workshop. From understanding the nuances of the SaaS model to leveraging Amazon Web Services (AWS) cutting-edge solutions, this event is a must-attend for IT decision-makers. Secure your spot today! Register at https://lnkd.in/gKH6HwAZ When: Wednesday, August 7, 2024 Where: Colony @ Eco City, Kuala Lumpur Louis Zac Cherian | Shoaib Khalil | Anirudh Marc Jaikumar | Eunice Cheng #AWSStartupCommunity #aws #startups #isv

$10 Billion from Big Tech Malaysia is awakening to a prosperous future, attracting significant investments and interest from Southeast Asian countries and beyond. To explore this, I will dive into insights from Openspace, a formidable fund in Southeast Asia with over $800M under management. With now going active in Malaysia, they are ideally positioned to discuss the country's potential. I'll be chatting with Matthew Windsor, who will answer some intriguing questions you won't want to miss. Join us for this and more at the Tech in Asia Conference KL on 24th/25th July to learn more. If you haven't registered yet, use the Amazon Web Services (AWS) 20% off code AWS20OFF to attend one of the biggest events in town and discover what the future holds. Eunice Cheng | Louis Zac Cherian | Miguel Luis Ochosa | Ian Sikora | Lakshmi Priya | Peter Murray | Tiffany Bloomquist (Pfaff) #AWSStartupCommunity #TIAConferenceKL

Building Global Companies from Malaysia? Join industry leaders on July 23, 2024, from 3:30 to 6:30 pm at the Amazon Web Services (AWS) Office in Kuala Lumpur to explore strategies and insights on scaling businesses globally. Hear from experts like Adriel Yong üëãüèª , Chen Chow Yeoh, Jatin Solanki, and Sophie Chiu as they share their experiences and advice. This event is an invaluable opportunity for networking, learning, and gaining the tools you need to take your company to the next level. Quyen Nguyen | Louis Zac Cherian | Anirudh Marc Jaikumar #AWSStartupCommunity #AWSForMalaysia

Purpose fuels your journey! And this was evident in our first AMAZe event at Amazon Web Services (AWS) Kuala Lumpur office with RKD Digital. Led by Malaysia's renowned storyteller Richard Ker, we heard incredible stories from founders who are transforming lives. From empowering refugees to championing environmental sustainability, these startups are overcoming immense challenges and driving innovation. The diverse lineup showcased the power of purpose in building successful ventures. It was an inspiring experience that left a lasting impression. Anxiously waiting for the next one! Arief Imran | Suzanne Ling | Harith Green Carpenter | Mel Chai | Alex Osborne | Samantha Kaan | Louis Zac Cherian #AWSStartupCommunity #AWSForMalaysia

üöÄ üá≤üáæ 15 Job Roles in AWS Malaysia!! With our expansion and region launch around the corner, these roles are primarily open to individuals based in Malaysia. I have included the job IDs next to each role to make it easier to find them on our career page. If you have a strong profile that aligns with the job description, feel free to drop me a DM for more details. Alternatively, please share this information within your network. Database Partner Solution Architect (2647189) AWS APJ Digital Partner Lead (2668923) Enterprise Services Manager (2587430) Sr. Partner Business Development Specialist, Analytics (2647189) Partner Sales Manager, Malaysia (2640192) Account Manager (2622442) Cloud Sales Representative, Malaysia (2640200) Solutions Architect (2600368) Solution Architect, AGS Tech (2660053) Partner Development Rep, APJ (2649927) Commissioning Engineer (2579576) Data Center Facility Manager (2664965) Data Center Chief Engineer, AWS Infrastructure Operations (2666512) Partner Development Rep, APJ (Korean Speaker) (2649933) Partner Organization Leader (2674245) Career Page : https://lnkd.in/gFSDYxY2 Peter Murray | Tiffany Bloomquist (Pfaff) | Serena Kang #JobOpenings #AWSForMY #AWSMalaysia

The Power of Stories!! Join Our Inspiring Event with RKD! Thrilled to collaborate with RKD, led by one of Malaysia's top influencers, Richard Ker. With over 350K followers on social media and extensive experience in the startup ecosystem, Richard and his team are bringing in some incredible entrepreneurs to share their journeys. Hear from: ‚úÖ Arief Imran, founder of Alomaid, transforming domestic staffing with ethical employment practices and technology-driven solutions. ‚úÖ Suzanne Ling, founder of PichaEats, serving great food while providing refugees in Malaysia the opportunity to start anew. ‚úÖ Harith Green Carpenter, founder of Green Factory, Malaysia‚Äôs pioneering manufacturer of sustainable wood products. ‚úÖ Mel Chai, founder of Madhair, a productivity-driven hair care company. Join us to discover how these founders built their companies from the ground up and be inspired and AMAZe. Limited registration slots available. Register now at https://lu.ma/vei77s48 Louis Zac Cherian | Samantha Kaan | Anirudh Marc Jaikumar | Louis Zac Cherian #AWSStartupCommunity #AWSForMY
